类的使用
org.springframework.aop.support.annotation.AnnotationMatchingPointcut

  • 使用AnnotationMatchingPointcut的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.aop.support.annotation
    Annotation support for AOP pointcuts.

    • org.springframework.aop.support.annotation中AnnotationMatchingPointcut的使用

      返回AnnotationMatchingPointcut的org.springframework.aop.support.annotation中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static AnnotationMatchingPointcut AnnotationMatchingPointcut.forClassAnnotation(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotationType)
      Factory method for an AnnotationMatchingPointcut that matches for the specified annotation at the class level.
      static AnnotationMatchingPointcut AnnotationMatchingPointcut.forMethodAnnotation(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotationType)
      Factory method for an AnnotationMatchingPointcut that matches for the specified annotation at the method level.
